Verses: 1 edhomiyarin Thagappanaagiya Esaavin Vamsavaralaaru:
2 esaa Kaanaan Dhesaththup Pengalil Eththiyanaana Elonin Kumaaraththiyaagiya Aadhaalaiyum, Eviyanaagiya Sipiyonin Kumaaraththiyum Aanaakin Kumaaraththiyumaagiya Akolipaamaalaiyum,
3 ismavelin Kumaaraththiyum Nepaayoththin Sagodhariyumaagiya Pasmaaththaiyum Vivaagampanniyirundhaan.
4 aadhaal Esaavukku Eleeppaasaip Petraal; Pasmaaththu Rekuvelaip Petraal.
5 akolipaamaal Eyooshaiyum, Yaalaamaiyum, Koraakaiyum Petraal; Ivargale Esaavukkuk Kaanaan Dhesaththile Pirandha Kumaarar.

6 esaa Than Manaivigalaiyum, Than Kumaararaiyum, Than Kumaaraththigalaiyum, Than Veettilulla Yaavaraiyum, Than Aadumaadugalaiyum, Matra Jeevajandhukkal Yaavaiyum, Thaan Kaanaan Thesaththile Sampaadhiththa Aasthi Muzhuvadhaiyum Serththukkondu, Than Sagodharanaagiya Yaakkobai Vittup Pirindhu Vere Dhesaththukkup Ponaan.

7 avargaludaiya Sampaththu Migudhiyaayirundhapadiyinaal Avargal Orumiththuk Kudiyirukkak Koodaamarpoyitru; Avargaludaiya Mandhaigalinimiththamaai Avargal Thangiyirundha Boomi Avargalaith Thaangak Koodaadhadhaayirundhadhu.
8 aadhalaal Esaa Seyeermalaiyil Kudiyerinaan; Esaavukku Edhom Endrum Per.
9 seyeermalaiyil Irukkira Edhomiyarudaiya Thagappanaagiya Esaavin Sandhadhigalum,
10 esaavin Kumaararudaiya Naamangalumaavana: Esaavin Manaiviyaagiya Aadhaaludaiya Kumaaranukku Eleeppaas Endru Per; Esaavin Manaiviyaagiya Pasmaaththudaiya Kumaaranukku Rekuvel Endru Per.
11 eleeppaasin Kumaarar, Themaan, Omaar, Seppo, Gaththaam Kenaas Enpavargal.
12 thimnaal Esaavin Kumaaranaagiya Eleeppaasukku Marumanaiyaattiyaayirundhu, Eleeppaasukku Amalekkaip Petraal; Ivargale Esaavin Manaiviyaagiya Aadhaaludaiya Puththirar.
13  Reguveludaiya Kumaarar, Nagaath, Seraaku, Sammaa, Meesaa Enbavargal; Ivargale Esaavin Manaiviyaagiya Pasmaaththin Puththirar.
14 sipiyonin Kumaaraththiyum Aanaakin Kumaaraththiyumaana Akolipaamaal Engira Esaavin Manaivi Eyoosh, Yaalaam, Koraaku Ennum Puththirarai Esaavukkup Petraal.
15 esaavin Kumaararil Thondriya Pirabukkalaavana: Esaavukku Mooththamaganaagiya Eleeppaasudaiya Kumaararil Themaan Pirabu, Omaar Pirabu, Seppo Pirabu, Kenaas Pirabu,
16 koraaku Pirabu, Gaththaam Pirabu, Amalekku Pirabu Enbavargal; Ivargal Edhom Dhesaththil Eleeppaasin Sandhadhiyum Aadhaalin Kumaararumaayirundha Pirabukkal.

17 esaavin Kumaaranaagiya Rekuvelin Puththiraril Nagaadh Pirabu, Seraaku Pirabu, Sammaa Pirabu, Meesaa Pirabu Enbavargal; Ivargal Edhom Dhesaththil Reguvelin Sandhadhiyum Esaavin Manaiviyaagiya Pasmaaththin Kumaararumaayirundha Pirabukkal.

18 esaavin Manaiviyaagiya Akolipaamaalin Kumaarar, Eyoosh Pirabu, Yaalaam Pirabu, Koraaku Pirabu Enbavargal; Ivargal Aanaakin Kumaaraththiyum Esaavudaiya Manaiviyumaagiya Akolipaamaalin Sandhadhiyaayirundha Pirabukkal.
19 ivargale Edhom Ennum Esaavin Sandhadhi; Ivargale Avargalilirundha Pirabukkal.
20 andhath Dhesaththin Kudigalaagiya Oriyanaana Seyeerin Kumaarar, Loththaan, Sopaal, Sibiyon, Aanaaku,
21 thishon, Edhser, Thishaan Enbavargal; Ivargale Edhom Dhesaththil Seyeerin Puththiraraagiya Oriyarudaiya Sandhadhiyaayirundha Pirabukkal.
22 loththaanudaiya Kumaarar, Ori, Emaam Enpavargal; Loththaanin Sagodhari Thimnaal Enpaval.
23 sopaalin Kumaarar, Alvaan, Maanagaadh, Epaal, Seppo, Onaam Enpavargal.
24 sipiyonin Kumaarar, Ayaa, Aanaaku Enpavargal; Vanaandharaththile Than Thagappanaagiya Seepeyonin Kazhudhaigalai Meykkaiyil, Koveru Kazhudhaigalaik Kandupidiththa Aanaaku Ivandhaan.
25 aanaakin Pillaigal, Thishon, Akolipaamaal Enpavargal; Indha Akolipaamaal Aanaakin Kumaaraththi.
26  Thishonudaiya Kumaarar, Emdhaan, Espaan, Iththaraan, Keraan Enpavargal.
27 edhserudaiya Kumaarar, Pilgaan, Sagavaan, Akgaan Enpavargal.
28  Thishaanudaiya Kumaarar, Oodhs, Araan Enpavargal.
29 oriyarin Sandhadhiyil Thondriya Pirabukkal, Loththaan Pirabu, Sopaal Pirabu, Sipiyon Pirabu, Aanaaku Pirabu,
30 thishon Pirapbu, Edhser Pirabu, Thishaan Pirabu Enpavargal; Ivargale Seyeer Dhesaththile Thangal Thangal Idangalil Irundha Oriyar Sandhadhiyaana Pirabukkal.
31 isravel Puththirarmel Raajaakkal Arasaalugiradharku Munne, Edhom Dhesaththile Aanda Raajaakkalaanavar:
32 peyorudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Pelaa Edhomile Arasaandaan; Avanudaiya Pattanaththukkuth Thingaapaa Endru Per.
33  Pelaa Mariththapin, Posraa Pattanaththaanaagiya Seraakudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Yopaap Avan Pattaththirku Vandhaan.
34 yopaap Mariththapin, Themaaniya Thesaththaanaagiya Ushaam Avan Pattaththirku Vandhaan.
35 ushaam Mariththapin, Movaabin Naattile Meedhiyaaniyarai Muriya Adiththa Pedhaadhin Kumaaranaagiya Aadhaadh Avan Pattaththirku Vandhaan; Avanudaiya Pattanaththukku Aaveedh Endru Per.
36 aadhaadh Mariththapin, Masrekgaa Ooraanaagiya Samlaa Avanudaiya Pattaththirku Vandhaan.
37 samlaa Mariththapin Ange Irukkira Nadhikkuch Sameebamaana Regobodh Ennum Ooraanaagiya Savul Avanudaiya Pattaththirku Vandhaan.
38 savul Mariththapin, Akporudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Paagaalgaanaan Avanudaiya Pattaththirku Vandhaan.

39 akporudaiya Kumaaranaagiya Paagaalgaanaan Mariththapin, Aadhaar Avanudaiya Pattaththirku Vandhaan; Avanudaiya Pattanaththukkup Paaku Endru Per; Avan Manaiviyin Per Mekedhapel; Aval Madhreththudaiya Kumaaraththiyum Mesagaavin Kumaaraththiyumaai Irundhaal.

40 thangal Parpala Vamsangalinpadiyeyum Vaasasthalangalinpadiyeyum Naamadheyangalinpadiyeyum Esaavin Sandhadhiyil Thondriya Pirabukkaludaiya Naamangalaavana: Thimnaa Pirabu, Alvaa Pirabu, Edhedh Pirabu,
41 akolipaamaa Pirabu, Elaa Pirabu, Pinon Pirabu,
42 kenaas Pirabu, Themaan Pirabu, Mipsaar Pirabu,
43 makdhiyel Pirabu, Eeraam Pirabu; Ivargale Thangal Sondhamaana Dhesaththile Parpala Idangalil Kudiyirundha Edhom Sandhadhip Pirabukkal; Indha Edhomiyarukkuth Thagappan Esaa.
